item.title: Expecting Abroad: Reimagining Pregnancy in Japan
item.description: Navigating pregnancy in Japan as a foreigner can feel overwhelming. In this personal reflection, I share my fears, questions, and the beginning of a series about what it’s really like to start a family abroad — from cultural differences to practical steps and support.

item.title: Moving in Japan: Practical Advice for First-Time Movers
item.description: Moving to Tokyo? Here's a practical guide on how to choose where to live based on budget, train access, and real estate tips. Learn from firsthand experience and avoid common mitakes.

item.title: Navigating Identity in Japan as an Asian American
item.description: What does it mean to be Asian American in Japan? One writer reflects on nine years of navigating identity, fitting in, and being misunderstood as a Japanese-passing foreigner. A personal look at race, language, and self-discovery far from home.

item.title: College in Japan: My Experience as an International Student
item.description: Curious about what college in Japan is really like? Here's my honest take on attending university abroad—from culture shock and loneliness to lifelong friendships and personal growth.

item.title: LDR: Is it Worth it?
item.description: Is a long distance relationship worth the struggle? One writer shares her honest story of love, growth, and heartbreak between Japan and the U.S.

item.title: Starting Over at 27
item.description: Feeling lost in your late 20s? You're not alone. Here's an honest reflection on stepping away from expectations, facing burnout, and learning how to start over.
